dr.matrix
Interface Matrix

All Known Subinterfaces:
MutableMatrix
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColumnVector, ConcreteMatrix, DistanceMatrix, F84DistanceMatrix, JukesCantorDistanceMatrix, Matrix.AbstractMatrix, MutableMatrix.AbstractMutableMatrix, PatristicDistanceMatrix, RowVector, SMMDistanceMatrix
public interface Matrix

An inteface for an immutable matrix.

Version:
$Id: Matrix.java,v 1.8 2006/06/18 16:20:58 alexei Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut

Nested Class Summary
static class Matrix.AbstractMatrix
          Abstract class providing a base for immutable matrix implementations.
static class Matrix.MatrixException
          The base matrix exception
static class Matrix.NotSquareException
          Thrown when the matrix should be square but it's not
static class Matrix.Util
          Static class providing maths and utility functions
static class Matrix.WrongDimensionException
          Thrown when the dimensions of a matrix are wrong
